QuestData.Title: Running Rampant
QuestData.Description: There is one thing that every army needs, and that is a supply line.$B$BThe enemy camp to the west contains a large beast herd, which serves as the yaungol army's main source of food.$B$BLuckily for us, the yaks and mushan beasts of this region are easily scared.$B$BSneak in, give the beasts a good slap, and watch the results.
QuestData.RewardText: Ohohoho! I saw those animals trailing dust from up here.$B$BThose yaungol are probably still wondering what happened.
